column2: I love me some Cafe Babareeba!  Yes
column3: I know it's not considered "authentic tapas"
column4: but whatever it is they serve
column5: it's damn good for this girl!  I've been coming here for about almost 20 years now (good lord!) and it's one of my go-to places.  Did you know that my husband's flooring company installed the interesting sun pattern in the front entryway?  Just a bit a trivia - but I was coming here long before I met him!
